-- error_code_out: -- 0: succeeded -- *: DB error CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.delete_character @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @ec INT SET @ec = 0
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION DELETE FROM dbo.Accept_Quest_Missions WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.Accept_Quests WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.Complete_Quests WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.GameMonies WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.ActionBars WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.Skills WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.EquipItemInfos WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.Equipments WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.Inventories WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.Quest_Inventories WHERE character_id = @character_id DELETE FROM dbo.Characters WHERE id = @character_id
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH SET @ec = ERROR_NUMBER() IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
RETURN (@ec)
